Olivine Ambergul was a Netherese medusa residing near Daggerford around 1480 DR.
Olivine, totally insane, resided in a special section of her familys crypt crafted for her by her father. She was protected by Malgast, a flesh golem created from the remains of her brothers Kamal and Gaston (as well as a few other nameless donors). The golem was totally under Olivines command
Olivine was the daughter of Lord Reynard Ambergul, a Netherese noble whod become rich robbing tombs and just for fun gathering a small cult to the Elemental Princes of Evil, collecting also some powerful scrolls and artifacts.
After poisoning three husbands in five years in order to gain their money, a curse struck Olivine, transforming her into a medusa. She spent all her fortune and time searching for a cure. At last, her father took pity on her and permitted her to live inside the family crypt where Reynards grave robbers also put the remains of her dead husbands.
